com.koalog.util
Class I18N

java.lang.Object
  com.koalog.util.I18N
public class I18N
extends java.lang.Object

A utility classed used for internationalization purposes. Each instance of I18N is bound to a locale, and maps (resource bundle, key) pairs to strings.

The class also provides static methods avoiding to you the management of multiple I18N instances.

Field Summary

          A map of the already loaded resource bundles, keyed by name.

Field Detail

_locale

protected java.util.Locale _locale
The instance locale. All mappings will be done using that locale.

_bundles

protected java.util.HashMap _bundles
A map of the already loaded resource bundles, keyed by name.

Method Detail

getBundle

protected java.util.ResourceBundle getBundle(java.lang.String bundleName)
Get the specified bundle. Load it if required.

Parameters:
bundleName - Name of the resource bundle to get.
Returns:
A resource bundle.

getString

public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String bundleName,
                                  java.lang.String key)
Get the string mapped to the specified (resource bundle, key) pair.

Parameters:
bundleName - Name of the resource bundle to look into.
key - Key of the desired string in the specified resource bundle.
Returns:
The string representation of the key, according to the bound locale.

getInstance

public static I18N getInstance()
Get an instance of I18N bound to the default locale. The default locale can safely be changed to new values, this method will take the changes into account.

Returns:
A valid I18N instance.

getInstance

public static I18N getInstance(java.util.Locale locale)
Get an instance of I18N bound to the specified locale.

Parameters:
locale - The locale to bind the I18N instance to.
Returns:
A valid I18N instance.

getString

public static java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String bundleName,
                                         java.lang.String key,
                                         java.util.Locale locale)
Get the string mapped to the specified (resource bundle, key) pair using the given locale.

Parameters:
bundleName - Name of the resource bundle to look into.
key - Key of the desired string in the specified resource bundle.
locale - The locale to use for the mapping.
Returns:
The string representation of the key, according to the given locale.
